Package ohos.agp.text

Class SimpleTextLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.text.Layout
      • ohos.agp.text.SimpleTextLayout

  • public class SimpleTextLayout
extends Layout
    Represents the simple text layout.
    Since:
    3

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleTextLayout

        public SimpleTextLayout​(String textSource,
                        Paint textPaint,
                        Rect rect,
                        int width)
        A constructor used to create a SimpleTextLayout instance with a specified text, paint attribute of the text, rectangle where the text is displayed, and maximum width of the text.

        By default, the text direction is from left to right.

        Parameters:
        textSource - Indicates the text.
        textPaint - Indicates the paint attribute of the text.
        rect - Indicates the rectangle where the text is displayed.
        width - Indicates the maximum width of the text.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Throws this exception if any parameter is null.
        Since:
        3

      • SimpleTextLayout

        public SimpleTextLayout​(String textSource,
                        Paint textPaint,
                        Rect rect,
                        int width,
                        boolean isRtl)
                 throws NullPointerException
        A constructor used to create a SimpleTextLayout instance with a specified text, paint attribute of the text, rectangle where the text is displayed, maximum width of the text, and text direction.
        Parameters:
        textSource - Indicates the text.
        textPaint - Indicates the paint attribute of the text.
        rect - Indicates the rectangle where the text is displayed.
        width - Indicates the maximum width of the text.
        isRtl - Indicates the text direction. The value true indicates the right-to-left text direction, and false indicates the opposite.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Throws this exception if any parameter is null.
        Since:
        3

    • Method Detail

      • calculateTextWidth

        public float calculateTextWidth​(String source,
                                Paint textPaint)
        Calculates the text width.
        Parameters:
        source - Indicates the text whose width is to be calculated.
        textPaint - Indicates the paint attribute of the text.
        Returns:
        Returns the text width, in px.
        Since:
        3
